title: Fragment, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
Woven
description: Square medallion sewn onto linen fabric with weft pile loops. The square has baskets, or bowls, containing fruits or flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 4th–5th century.Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
Woven. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-33.
